CustomField.description: If selected and API Resource Correlation ID is populated, PSA updates start date or last date when a resource's employment status becomes active or terminated. API Resource Correlation ID is always populated when details are entered via the API.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected and API Resource Correlation ID is populated, PSA updates start date or last date when a resource's employment status becomes active or terminated. API Resource Correlation ID is always populated when details are entered via the API.
CustomField.label: Update Resource Employment Dates
